msg: LANG-1020: Improve performance of normalize space. Thanks to Libor Ondrusek. This closes #27 from github.

author: jacopoc
msg: Made connection-factory element in entityengine.xml optional: in fact there are transaction managers that do not depend an external connection pool because it is already integrated (e.g. Atomikos Transaction Essentials).
